About Quiver

The Project

Quiver was born from a simple desire to have a proper style guide at Incomm Digital Solutions, and grew to a very handy multi-purpose tool. After several months of part-time development, the TotallyRad® meter was off the charts, and so we polished her up and decided to share with the public. We use it as a living style guide, a rapid prototyping tool, a simpler-to-maintain production code base, a development sandbox, an accountability check, and a neato side-project to keep ourselves jazzed. You can read in more detail about what is going on here on our [wherever we end up putting the educational copy].

We hope you find Quiver as useful as we do, and please share your feedback with us so we can keep the TotallyRad® meter turned up to full-blast.
